Audio.Author: Luiz Gabriel Mazzoni
Audio.Comments: This bird was collected and deposited in the Ornithological Collection of the Museu de Ciências Naturais PUC Minas, Belo Horizonte, Minas Gerais, under the number MCNA 1950.bird-seen:yesplayback-used:yes
